question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Vault Operation DoS] If override happens during vault operation execution, could oracle unavailability block op_value_update, locking vault in 'during operation' state? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Decimal Conversion] If new oracle uses different price decimals (1e9 vs 1e18) post-override, could vault price conversions overflow/underflow? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Request Buffer Impact] If oracle override causes price discontinuity, could pending deposit/withdrawal requests in vault buffers execute at wrong prices? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Loss Tolerance Bypass] Could attacker override oracle to hide vault losses below loss_tolerance threshold, preventing emergency shutdowns? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Assets Value Updated Flag] Does oracle override reset vault's assets_value_updated timestamp, potentially allowing stale valuations? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Concurrent Override] Multiple transactions can call run() for same oracle simultaneously. Could race enable conflicting TEE credentials being set? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Authority Change Race] If queue authority is revoked between tx submission and execution, could stale validation pass despite invalid authority? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Last Override Race] Two overrides completing simultaneously could both read old last_queue_override_ms, then both write, losing one timestamp update? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Queue-Oracle Lock] No mutex prevents concurrent modifications to queue and oracle. Could parallel transactions corrupt shared state? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Event Ordering Race] If two overrides emit events concurrently, could event log show incorrect chronological order? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Gas Exhaustion] If secp256k1_key or mr_enclave vectors are extremely large, could copying them into event and oracle state exhaust gas, DoSing override mechanism? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Version Lock DoS] If queue or oracle upgrades to incompatible version, all override attempts fail, permanently DoSing oracle updates? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Authority Griefing] Malicious queue authority could repeatedly override with invalid credentials, causing continuous oracle failures and vault DoS? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Clock DoS] If Clock object becomes unavailable (network issue, upgrade), could all override operations fail indefinitely? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Oracle Lock] If oracle is locked by another operation, could override attempts revert, DoSing TEE key rotation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Oracle Override Front-Run] Attacker monitoring mempool could front-run legitimate override with malicious TEE keys, hijacking oracle control before proper authority completes? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Price Manipulation Setup] Attacker could override oracle with controlled TEE just before vault operation, feed manipulated prices, then restore legitimate TEE to hide attack? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Timestamp Manipulation] MEV bot could delay override transaction to control timestamp value, gaming time-based oracle expiration mechanisms? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: run()] [Sandwich Attack] Attacker could sandwich user vault operations between two oracle overrides (manipulate price → user loses → restore), extracting value? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Authority Sniping] If queue authority is being transferred, could attacker snipe last override before authority transfer completes? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Zero Vector Length] If secp256k1_key or mr_enclave have length 0, could empty credentials pass validation and corrupt oracle? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Max Vector Length] If vectors approach maximum Sui vector size, could override operation exceed transaction size limits? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Expiration = u64::MAX] Setting expiration to maximum u64 could cause overflow when compared against clock.timestamp_ms() in future? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_override_oracle_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Queue/Oracle Deletion] If queue or oracle is deleted mid-transaction, could dangling references cause undefined behavior? (High)
